labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Spellchecker shows results for the first misspelled word in the sentence even after it has been corrected
data.expected_result: Spellchecker shows results for the next misspelled word in the sentence
data.short_description: Spellcheck continues showing results for the first misspelled word in a group of selected words containing multiple misspelled, even after correcting the first
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a sentence with two or more misspelled words - Highlight the sentence and correct a word with spellcheck, then repeat
